description: Contents: Sefer ha-sheʾelot le-mishʾalelah, attributed to Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra (ff. 1-3r). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Sefer ha-mivḥarim (ff. 3r-9r). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Sefer ha-ʿolam (ff. 9v-16). Shoshan ha-refuʾah (translation of Bernard de Gordon's Lilium medicinae) (ff. 17-225).
title: Miscellany
author: Ibn Ezra, Abraham ben Meïr (attributed to)
